block.p: American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Recalled OF Mark Quinn from Omaha of the PCL. Sent INF Ray Holbert outright to Omaha.
American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Recalled OF Mark Quinn from Omaha of the PCL. Sent INF Ray Holbert outright to Omaha.

OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled RHP Ariel Prieto from Sacramento of the PCL. Optioned RHP Luis Vizcaino to Sacramento. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed LHP Darren Oliver on 15-day disabled list, retroactive to June 17.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed SS Aaron Herr, 1B David LaRoche, 3B Scott Thorman, SS Keoni De Renne, and RHP Trey Hodges. Agreed to a terms with RHP Chris Clark. FLORIDA MARLINS--Signed RHP Denny Bautista. HOUSTON ASTROS--Placed LHP Billy Wagner on the 15-day disabled list. Called up RHP Jose Cabrera from New Orleans of the PCL.

National Basketball Association TORONTO RAPTORS--Named Lenny Wilkens coach. Women's National Basketball Association INDIANA FEVER--Activated C Donna Harrington and F Texlin Quinney from injured reserve. Placed G Chantel Tremitiere and C Alessandra Santos de Oliveira on injured reserve. MIAMI SOL--Activated C-F Sharon Manning from the injured list. Placed G Umeki Webb on the injured list. United States Basketball League PENNSYLVANIA VALLEYDAWGS--Activated G Donnie Carr from the inactive list. Signed F Luther Clay. NEW JERSEY SHORECATS--Activated F Rahshon Turner from the inactive list. Placed G Ishua Benjamin on the inactive list.
BOXING FLORIDA STATE BOXING COMMISSION--Named Alvin Entin chairman and Eduardo Lacasa vice chairman.

National Football League BUFFALO BILLS--Signed RB Sammy Morris. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Waived QB Eric Kresser. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Claimed CB Evan Howell off waivers from the New England Patriots. Signed OT Mark Tauscher and WR Charles Lee. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed OT Keno Hills to a one-year contract. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed FB Kevin Houser to a three-year contract. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Signed LB Shannon Taylor.
National Hockey League PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Named Ivan Hlinka coach.

APPALACHIAN STATE--Promoted men's associate head basketball coach Houston Fancher to men's basketball coach. BARUCH--Named Neil Barbella assistant baseball coach and recruiting coordinator. CENTRAL ARKANSAS--Named William E. Lide athletic director. CENTRAL CONNECTICUT STATE--Promoted women's assistant golf coach Dennis Coscina to women's golf coach. Named Ed Batogowski men's golf coach. CHARLESTON SOUTHERN--Named Jenna Lehmann women's assistant basketball coach. COLUMBIA--Named Tim Beach assistant track and field and cross country coach. LONG ISLAND U.--Named Tony Bozzella women's basketball coach. MONTANA STATE-BILLINGS--Named Pa'ulasi Mastavao women's volleyball coach. Named Craig Carse assistant athletic director. MORAVIAN--Named Paul Moyer athletics director. NEW MEXICO--Named Yvonne Sanchez women's assistant basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA-WILMINGTON--Named Kevin Ankrom track coach. NORTHERN IOWA--Named Brad Penrith wrestling coach. NOTRE DAME--Announced G Mike Monserez has left the basketball team and will transfer. OHIO STATE--Named Leeann Parker assistant director of athletics communications. OKLAHOMA--Named Jim Ragan men's golf coach. SKIDMORE--Named Christine Peppiatt aquatics director and men's and women's swimming coach. SOUTHERN METHODIST--Announced basketball G Jeryl Sasser has withdrawn from the NBA draft and will return to school for his senior season. SPRINGFIELD--Named Cathie Schweitzer director of athletics, effective July 17. WEST ALABAMA--Named Gary Rundles baseball coach.
